title: [網球] 溫布頓網球錦標賽  (5)

replies.msg:
溫布頓網球錦標賽是網球運動中歷史最長和最具聲望的公開賽。錦標賽通常舉辦於6月底至7月初，是每年度網球大滿貫的第3項賽事，排在澳洲公開賽和法國公開賽之後，美國公開賽之前。

2017溫布頓網球錦標賽
賽事資料
日期：7月3-16日
地點：英國溫布頓
場地：草地
獎金：£31,600,000
2016年冠軍（男單）：梅利（英國）
2016年冠軍（女單）：莎蓮娜威廉絲（美國）

From a Swiss newspaper:

You skipped the clay season. How much have you practiced on grass?


Federer: "I've never practiced more on grass than 2017. Already during the first week in Roland Garros. Because of my early exit in Stuttgart, i had even more time to practice. I feel better prepared that ever before. (...) During the tournament in Halle, i felt realy calm for the first time on grass. It showed me that i finally found the rhythm on grass. I felt that my self confidence was getting bigger and bigger."

轉自外國網友分析：

Seeds in danger in round 1 at Wimbledon


Wawrinka - he's shaky in slam first rounds, grass is his worst surface and medvedev has been playing really well on it.

Cilic - kohli is always dangerous , really on any surface. marin is gonna have to be on his game from the start

Ramos-Vinolas - certainly on grass he's vulnerable to the upset. Thompson might like his chances here

Mischa Zverev - Tomic is a dangerous and unknown guy. grass is his best surface so if he shows up he has the game to take down zverev

Thiem - pospisil is the favorite here. another early wimbledon exit coming for Thiem. probably in 3 sets again

Berdych - chardy can play well on grass. recent loss to lajovic for jeremy isnt encouraging as far as his form is concerned though

Del potro - has not played on grass yet, fitness might not be 100% and kokkinakis can play well

Kyrgios - is he fit? if he is herbert should be no problem

Isner - fritz can play well on the grass and isner has just looked so bad for 90% of the season so far. with the exception of a few tournaments he just hasnt looked that good . he's been disposed of easily in both his grass warm ups

Monfils - brands has the game to take him out if he's on and serving well

溫布頓（Wimbledon）在首圈有多個男子球手因傷退賽，今晨女單次圈更出現極嚴重受傷。事件發生在17號場地，由女單世界排名103、女雙世界排名第一的馬迪姬辛絲（Bethanie Mattek-Sands）對施史迪雅（Sorana Cirstea）。當時盤數打成1︰1，32歲美國馬迪姬辛絲在第3盤首局上網時右膝部嚴重扭曲倒地，她痛不欲生大呼︰「HELP ME! HELP ME! Fuck，HELP ME! HELP ME!」對手施史迪雅立即上前查看並要求賽會盡快急救，她安慰道︰「我在這裏，你很堅強，一定捱得過的。」醫護人員為馬迪姬辛絲治療及送她入急症室。

指醫療人員花逾10分鐘到場

將在第3圈對梅古露莎的施史迪雅抱怨賽會反應慢︰「當時我的物理治療師及她的丈夫在場。等了很久，大約10至15分鐘才有醫療人員到場，太久了。如果心臟病發的話怎麼辦？看到她受傷如同心碎了，她在狂叫，我看到膝部不在正常位置。」溫布頓發言人否認程序有問題︰「當下只花1分鐘就有合資格的救護人員到達17號場，之後即場為她鎮痛，再由急救車送到醫院。」

近1年多，塞爾維亞球星祖高域（Novak Djokovic）緋聞纏身，與太太的婚姻陷入僵局，先後傳出秘撻烏克蘭律師和塞爾維亞同鄉流行歌手。去年3月，祖高域亦被拍到密會印度天后Deepika Padukone，不僅在美國洛杉磯共晉晚餐，更登上同一汽車離開，令人無限聯想。
